Content:: This article documents the timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in Romania. Sources:  COVID-19 vaccination in Romania started on 27 December. The first person to be vaccinated is Mihaela Anghel, a hospital nurse.[85][86] Iohannis was vaccinated on 15 January.[87] On 4 December, the Ministry of Health confirmed the first two cases of Omicron variant had been detected in the country.[99]
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in Romania - Wikipedia
